tasks: Parallel reduction of a pencil to Hessenberg-triangular form
title: Parallel two-stage reduction to Hessenberg-triangular form
abstract: We present a two-stage algorithm for the parallel reduction of a pencil to Hessenberg-triangular form. Traditionally, two-stage Hessenberg-triangular reduction algorithms achieve high performance in the first stage, but struggle to achieve high performance in the second stage. Our algorithm extends techniques described by Karlsson et al. to also achieve high performance in the second stage. Experiments in a shared memory environment demonstrate that the algorithm can outperform state-of-the-art implementations.
